title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 386.3 - Training plan requirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 386.3 - Training plan requirement

State Regulations

Each social services district shall be required annually
to submit a staff development plan to the department for approval. This plan
shall be in accordance with the guidelines established by the Federal and State
governments. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
386.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
